title: Does Iceland Pay $5,000 Per Month to Immigrants Who Marry Icelandic Women?
subtitle: Unreliable online sources claimed that that due to a shortage of men, Iceland was offering to pay immigrants to take Icelandic women as their brides.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Due to a shortage of men, Iceland will pay $5,000 per month to immigrants who marry Icelandic women.
